changelog:
• Upstream Linux 4.4.262
 • Add ARM64-specific support for flatmem
 • Block access to mounts for IsolatedService
 • Hide magisk mounts for IsolatedService
 • Make scheduling period more efficient
 • Start killing wakelocks after two minutes of idle (120s)
 • When tcp stack not buggy init window size to 64K otherwise lock to 32k
 • Use get_random_int() to fix entropy depleting
